概述  软件包   类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

jcurses.system
类 InputChar

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.system.InputChar

public class InputChar
extends java.lang.Object

The instances of this class represent characters or key codes, that are input by an user. An instance of the class contains einther a ascii character or one of in the class declared constants for function keys and control keys.

方法详细信息

isSpecialCode

public boolean isSpecialCode()
The return value of this method tells, whether the instance contains a control code or an ascii character.

返回：
true, if a control code is contained, false otherwise.

getCharacter

public char getCharacter()
The method returns the character, contained in this object.

返回：
the character, contained in this object
抛出：
java.lang.RuntimeException, - if the instance doesn't contain a character, but a control code

toString

public int getCode()
返回：

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Two instances of this class are equal, if they contain same codes.

覆盖：
类 java.lang.Object 中的 equals
参数：
obj - the object to compare
返回：
true, if this instance equal to obj, false otherwise

hashCode

public int hashCode()
